title.rendered: Attention: Energy, Marine and Property Insurers, Brokers and Insureds

content.rendered:
At this critical time, AqualisBraemar Adjusting is maintaining full operational capabilities where we can. Our comprehensive global footprint, along with our network of local resource partners, allows us to serve you, our local and regional clients as flexibly as possible. We can travel to service the required site attendances, where that travel and access is permitted. When we do, we have detailed hygiene and travel protocols to follow which balances staff, client and wider public health requirements with business continuity in line with WHO and other international government guidelines. 

During this difficult time, many of our office-based staff across the globe will be working remotely in line with local recommendations. We will continue working on our deliverables and where required we will increase the number of virtual meetings with our clients through our robust IT systems, to ensure that we do all we can to arrest the spread of the virus.

We ask our customers for a degree of patience and understanding. We will do our best within the circumstances, while putting health and safety first, to attend as soon as possible within the guidelines of the specific national restrictions in place. However, we have a considerable global footprint of Loss Adjusters, Experts and Local Resource Partners, which makes attendance more possible.

Our staff can always be reached via their regular business mobile phone number and/or email addresses.

Some useful contact numbers are listed below: 

Geoff Jones – Global – +44 7900 498174 

John Harris  – Asia Pacific – +65 9114 4650 

Dirk Jol  – Middle East & India – +971 (0)56 115 7521

Allan Kelly – Europe & Africa – +44 7899 910415 

Charles Honner – Americas – +1 346 763 9060

Paul Cameron – Calgary – +1 403 538 5450

AqualisBraemar will continue to serve its customers wherever they are and to the best of our ability during these difficult times.
